name: Turret 27
description:
[ES]

Torret 27 es un juego al estilo defiende tu castillo y shooter.

Tendras que sobrevivir a oleadas de enemigos y comprar provisiones para poder sobrevivir rondas mas altas.

[EN]

Torret 27 is a game in the style of defend your castle and shooter.

You will have to survive waves of enemies and buy supplies in order to survive higher rounds.
